Ms Photodraw 2000 Version 2

06 Oct 1999

Microsoft released the second version of its PhotoDraw 2000 imaging software this past Monday pointing out tighter integration with Office2k, improved performance, and a new set of Web 'features'.

\n

\nAccording to the press release, MS is expecting to ship in late October with a $109US price tag... Its always interesting to watch how well a MS product does in a market it *doesnt* dominate.
